name: Sauve Sabretooth's Completely fair platformer
description:
This completely normal platformer was made by Sid(920974), Namrax(931865), alex(945616) and david(946746). 

Space - jump

A and D - movement

escape - quit

The only known bug (yet) in the game is the audio issue in the first level which happens if you lose. so please try not to lose noob. Also apolgy for bad inglis in various parts in the game

big thanks to my m8 jet podunkar again for helping me with the music in the game. Instead of me paying him he wants y'all to go follow his ig @jax_gaming123 or else he will kidnap my family pls

Also all these levels are tested and all of them are passable
